job_tasks.justification: This phrase indicates a need to grasp customer needs and requirements, which is central to understanding the business context and aligning technical solutions.
Defining user experiences involves understanding how users will interact with the product, directly linking to business goals and user needs.

job_tasks.phrase: shape the future of IDEs for cloud development
job_tasks.justification: This statement suggests influencing the strategic direction and future capabilities of the product, which is a high-level business and product understanding task.

job_tasks.phrase: Define cloud-native IDE experiences that are as welcoming as they are powerful.
job_tasks.justification: This task requires understanding user needs and translating them into product features, a core aspect of business understanding and product definition.

job_tasks.phrase: work with teams across Amazon who want to provide in-IDE experiences for their services.
job_tasks.justification: This involves coordinating with other teams and understanding their service integration needs, demonstrating business and cross-functional understanding.
Identifying and resolving pain points is a direct way to understand user/customer needs and improve the product based on business requirements.
Evolving an experience implies understanding current user needs and business goals to plan future improvements.

job_tasks.phrase: Analyze telemetry to keep us focused on our customer's needs.
job_tasks.justification: Analyzing data (telemetry) to understand customer needs is a key business understanding activity for product development.

job_tasks.phrase: you will play a vital part in growing your peers.
job_tasks.justification: Mentoring and developing team members falls under the umbrella of contributing to the team's overall effectiveness and understanding its growth needs.

job_tasks.phrase: contribute to the culture and direction and deliver site-wide initiatives that will improve the life of all of our teams.
job_tasks.justification: This involves influencing team culture, strategic direction, and broad initiatives, which are aspects of understanding the business and its operational context.

job_tasks.phrase: balancing software craftsmanship, operational excellence, and delivering value to our customers
job_tasks.justification: This explicitly mentions delivering value to customers, a core business objective that guides technical work.

job_tasks.phrase: use generative AI to help developer be more productive in their IDEs, including CodeWhisperer.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly mentions the use of generative AI and a specific AI product (CodeWhisperer), indicating involvement in modeling or application of generative AI.
This is a clear indicator of software development tasks, focusing on building and contributing to open-source projects.

job_tasks.phrase: The ability to adapt to new technologies, tools, and methodologies in a rapidly evolving field.
job_tasks.justification: While a soft skill, it directly supports the software development lifecycle by ensuring the engineer can implement new tools and techniques.

job_tasks.phrase: balance a lot of things. To us, "agile" means balancing software craftsmanship, operational excellence, and delivering value to our customers
job_tasks.justification: This highlights the need for software craftsmanship, a key component of software development.

job_tasks.phrase: root-cause the issues and ensure our systems are resilient and fault-tolerant.
job_tasks.justification: This describes operational responsibilities related to system reliability and troubleshooting, which is part of MLOps or general ops engineering for deployed systems.
This explicitly states an operational responsibility for handling system issues, a common aspect of MLOps or production engineering.

soft_skills.phrase: Interact with Amazon developers all over the world
your ability to work with people with diverse viewpoints and backgrounds will be important.
have the opportunity to learn and grow as an engineer.
The ability to adapt to new technologies, tools, and methodologies in a rapidly evolving field.
shape the future of IDEs for cloud development.
play a vital part in growing your peers.
contribute to the culture and direction and deliver site-wide initiatives
We take risks, but we hold each other accountable for results and how the results were achieved.
We have a long-term vision, but we don't do big designs up front.

classification.rationale: The role focuses on defining and developing IDE experiences using generative AI, mentioning 'CodeWhisperer' and the goal of making developers more productive with AI. While there's strong emphasis on software development and business understanding, the core innovation driver is generative AI, aligning it with the GenAI Engineer profile.
